artist: Artist: Ronald King; Author: Geoffrey Chaucer; Author: Poem by Kevin Power; Publisher: Circle Press, London
creditline: Gift of The Martin S. Ackerman Foundation
description: 57 pages in slipcase, illustrated with 15 original screenprints; together with paper folder III: "The Squire", a poem by Kevin Power, 1978, and a loose 2-color lithograph (14-15/16 x 10 in.); binding: blue cloth with silver lettering; endpapers: blue, heavy wove; slip case: navy cloth
provenance: Martin S. Ackerman Foundation,New York (agent); given to MIA, 1979.
title: The Prologue to the Canterbury Tales
